item.title: Making Fishing Code Help
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

[quote=“RSPServer, post:1, topic:238612”][quote]//fishing codes
case 2:
if(playerLevel[10] < 85) {
sendMessage(“You are now fishing!”);
addItem(fishing id, 1);
}

    else if(playerLevel[10] > 85) {
	sendMessage("You need lvl 85 fishing lvl!");
}
        break;[/quote]

It just lets you fish at any lvl?!?[/quote]
What are the fishing ids? and also you didnt even add it right…

Read full topic

   else if(playerLevel[10] < 85) {
  sendMessage("You need lvl 85 fishing lvl!");

}
break;
